response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a commodity; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could enrich your life in ways you might not even imagine.

Considering its significance and rarity, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $500,000. This price reflects my deep appreciation for the item and my desire to see it go to someone who will cherish it as much as I have.

Please let me know if you are interested in exploring this offer further. I would be more than happy to discuss the details and answer any questions you might have. Your satisfaction and enjoyment of this product are paramount to me.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 500000}
